text: anshun defence where additional claim made in federal court when other claims arising from same transactions were pending in supreme court
plaintiffs' claims in supreme court had been commenced under earlier deed of release which required proceedings to be brought within defined time in supreme court and released other claims
plaintiffs' claims in supreme court proceedings were released for large payment under settlement deed
on review of facts, held that the plaintiffs acted unreasonably in bringing federal court proceedings, which should be summarily dismissed: alternatively, stayed as abuse of process
